/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of greenery and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting light and shadows that add depth to the image. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the various hues of the buildings.
